content:
Trang Bui I am a third-year PhD student in Statistics at University of Waterloo. My research interest lies in Statistical Learning, Statistical Modelling, and Network Statistics. I am working with Professor Stefan Steiner and Professor Nathaniel Stevens in the area of Design and Analysis of Experiments on Networks.
I am currently working as a Teaching Assistant and also a consultant at Statistical Consulting and Collaborative Research Unit at University of Waterloo.
I completed my undergraduate studies in Mathematical Sciences and Business Manangement at Korean Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST). I am inspired by art, history, music and languanges.
